post.title: Haven-X Disbands Following Graduation of Its Talents
post.content:
VTuber agency Haven-X has announced on Twitter that their talents Koa Himari and Viri Sylvaine have graduated as of August 17, 2022. They followed another talent, Roza Coatl, who graduated July 11 due to health concerns.

Regarding: Koa Himari, Viri Sylvaine, and the future of Haven-X pic.twitter.com/DsVlzVb0rV

— Haven-X Official (@havenx_official) August 17, 2022

In addition, Haven-X management said that Both Koa and Viri have declined to hold a graduation stream. As a result, Haven-X disbands following graduation of its talents.

YouTube memberships for all graduated talents will be closed by 11:59:59 PM JST on Monday, October 31.

In a separate tweet, Yoojun Kang, CEO of Still Green, Inc. which handles the agency, thanked everyone who has supported Haven-X, and apologized that they had to make this announcement.

Haven-X was first introduced as the world's first VTuber project dedicated to the metaverse, and the talents are referred to as "metaverse idols." The initial plan for its future development was "to provide a completely new entertainment experience with the use of technology, such as NFTs, blockchains, and the metaverse."

post.description: VTuber agency Haven-X has announced on Twitter that their talents Koa Himari and Viri Sylvaine have graduated as of August 17, 2022. YouTube memberships for all talents will be closed by October 31.

node.description: Slime alien VTuber and Kawa colleague PiaPi Yuefo shares her experience at the recent Nijisanji EN Animate Cafe collaboration.
